definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: In an Interior Tunnel/Wall Outside Scylla Hallway, Sucre is continuing to drill.
sentences.chinese: 在錫拉房間的牆外，蘇克雷正在給牆鑽孔。

sentences.english: When Lincoln and Sucre arrive at the pier, Gretchen and Self are gone.
sentences.chinese: 林肯和蘇克雷趕到碼頭，格雷琴和賽爾夫已經離開了。

sentences.english: As Gretchen descends down the stairwell, Sucre attacks her.
sentences.chinese: 格雷琴走下樓梯，蘇克雷向她襲擊。

sentences.english: T-Bag is allowed to answer the phone and finds Sucre on the other end.
sentences.chinese: 西奧多被允許應答了電話，電話的另一端竟是蘇克雷。
蘇克雷的小女兒健康成長，蘇克雷一臉的滿足。
蘇克雷的小女兒健康成長，蘇克雷一臉的滿足。

sentences.english: When Tuckhorn never shows up to work, Sucre leaves.
sentences.chinese: 塔克斯宏並沒有出現在辦公室，蘇克雷準備離開。

sentences.english: We then see Sucre give him another $100.
sentences.chinese: 不過我們很快就看到蘇克雷有塞給他100美金。

sentences.english: Self will get them Mahone, Bellick and Sucre as accomplices.
sentences.chinese: 他會找來馬宏，蘇克雷和巴利克來幫手。

sentences.english: Sucre slips out with Mahone, and Wyatt chases them.
sentences.chinese: 蘇克雷和馬宏趁亂逃出，懷亞特緊跟其後。

sentences.english: He calls Bellick and Sucre to have them meet him out back.
sentences.chinese: 他打電話叫巴利克和蘇克雷在後面接應他。

sentences.english: The police are there and arrest him and Bellick.
sentences.chinese: 警察出現了，逮捕了蘇克雷和巴利克。

sentences.english: In an Interior Tunnel/Wall Outside Scylla Hallway, Sucre is continuing to  drill.
sentences.chinese: 在錫拉房間的牆外，蘇克雷正在給牆鑽孔。

sentences.english: Back underground, Michael and Sucre hear the water stop flowing.
sentences.chinese: 在地下道，邁可和蘇克雷聽到了管道中水已流空。

sentences.english: Sucre seems to be hurting and Michael appears to be very  dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 蘇克雷看上去傷還沒好，而邁克似乎感到十分暈眩。
